alert.note: Alert for Mitchell (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 13 at 6:12PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Mitchell County through 645 PM CDT... At 611 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Glen Elder, or 9 miles west of Beloit, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Rural Areas South of Glen Elder. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
